args: After all this time, I finally remembered what\nLady Amaterasu was saying to me that day;\nthe last part I'd forgotten for so long.
Hear me, Izumo. As my emissary,\nyou will be granted two powers.
The first will permit you to come to\nTakamagahara and hear my voice.
...is the power to deliver the\npeople's prayers to me.
Is that somehow different from listening\nto the people's voices and telling you\nwhat they wish?
Oh, indeed. This is a powerful ability that\ncannot be stopped by anyone.
When you grow and come into your own,\nyou will understand what it means.
You are my emissary: one who will guide\nthe hearts of all Hinomotoans.
Gyaaaa! What's with this weather?!\nWait, and there's LIGHTNING?! EEEK!
It's just a storm, you idiots! Now pull\nyourselves together and take out that\nstupid girl! Haaaah!
This thunderstorm has them scattered.\nIf I put my back into it, I can TOTALLY\ntake them out now!
Idiots! Just do what I do and ready your\nweapons! A little lightning is nothing to\nbe afraid of!
But even if we DON'T get hit by lightning,\nwe're losing our way in the storm!
The insurgents have been defeated!\nI knew you could do it, Lady Yukimura!
It was easy once I went FULL HARDCORE!\nBut now that they're down, let's tie 'em up\nso they can't do any more harm.
I'll try, but it's difficult to do much\nin all this rain.
Huh? Look! The rain is letting up!
This storm must have been a miracle sent\nby Lady Amaterasu to protect you.
It's all because of the rainmaking ritual\nyou performed that allowed our prayers\nto reach the heavens.
Lady Amaterasu still watches over you,\nemissary! There can be no doubt!
Thank you, emissary. You truly are the\nhope for all Hinomoto.
I want you to be right about that, but...\nWhat do you think, Lady Yukimura?
I think you look SUPER relieved,\nis what I think.
I am—because as I watched the lightning\ncome down, I remembered something.
I have the power to carry the people's\nprayers to Lady Amaterasu.
And I know she is no longer with us...
But she may still hear the prayers\nI deliver.
After seeing a miracle like this,\nhow can you doubt it?
Soooo I'm guessing the fact you're talking\nlike everything's okay means all those\ndoubts of yours have been taken care of?
I think they have—but I was only able to\nfind my answer because you gave me a\ngood push, Lady Yukimura.
Please allow me to thank you once more.
Aw, don't mention it. Happy to help!

The Mukuroshu stragglers were captured, and
peace returned to the land. But some time later...

Chamber of Light
Thank you for responding to my call once\nmore, Wyrmclan leaders.
No need for such formalities, emissary.\nWhy have you summoned us here?
After the extremist remnants of the\nMukuroshu invaded the palace, I spent\na good deal of time thinking over my role.
And I have come to a conclusion.
I have decided it is my duty to grow closer\nto our people and encourage them, for they\nhave believed in me as their emissary.
And in order to fulfill that duty, I will\nembark on a journey across Hinomoto.
I agree it will not be easy, but I will take\non any peril if it permits me to atone to\nthe people of Hinomoto.
However, as it will be all I can do to keep\nmyself safe, I would like to humbly request\nyour assistance.
When I venture into your various domains,\nwill you lend me your strength?
I know I ask much of you, but...
I'll totally help out—and I'm pretty sure\nGeneral Shingen will too.
Agreed. We will do all we can to support\nyour decision.
It's our pleasure as elders to support young\nones whenever they strike out on their own\nexciting journeys.
Protecting you—the symbol of hope for\nall Hinomoto—has ever been one of our\nduties as Wyrmclan leaders!
You both have my thanks as well.
We all feel this is a fine decision, Izumo.
This journey will no doubt be a harsh one,\nwhich is precisely why we honor it.
I swear to serve you as an emissary of\nLady Amaterasu for as long as I live.
May the blessings of Lady Amaterasu be\nupon you and all the people of Hinomoto.
